command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Dimetrodon trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed a Dimetrodon!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Treats are for healing and breeding only! Use regular foods to heal adults or speed up growth for babies!"}]}
